overview: Guillermo is an old man who has wasted the best years of his life due to the belief that there is still much time to live. After the death of his parents, Guillermo takes refuge in his house. The days were long and the years passed until he meets someone who shows him a world he has never seen before.

production_companies.name: Consejo Para la Cultura y las Artes de Nuevo Leon (Conarte)

title: Awakening
